info.name: HPE OneSphere (Public)
info.description: Collection of calls to illustrate the use of the HPE OneSphere API

request.description: Get Status of HPE OneSphere. No authentication required.
Start with this call to get a session Token. We have automatically written the instructions to set the retrieved token as an Authorization Header for subsequent calls.
It's always good practice to cleanup after yourself. So we recommend deleting session token when done
Edit to replace with one of your existing username
